name: colorOMG
description:
This was put together for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022_2.

Color the world and your friends the color they love.

Didn't spend enough time on this, but figured I would submit it since I did like how the 2D splatter  worked out.

BUGS: sound is not working.

Controls:

 AWSD -> movement

space -> jump (double jump)

Mouse -> aim

Left mouse -> shoot 

Bonus: 

1-4 numbers -> change color

Thanks for playing.

credits:

Kenny.nl -> Art/Sound
